original_title: Crescendo: On How Not to Remain Quiet with Michael Fabiano
overview: From a young age, Michael Fabiano was told he wasn't good enough.  And things didn't get easier when he entered the world of opera.  Now, a global talent, Michael reflects on a journey that led him to find stardom, and love, inside New York City's Metropolitan Opera.
title: Crescendo: On How Not to Remain Quiet with Michael Fabiano
